hero.headline: BUILT FROM BLACK CULTURE. MADE FOR THE WORLD.
hero.tagline: WEAR IT BLACK. WEAR IT BOLD.

about.title: OUR STORY
about.paragraph1: BLACK is more than a name. It's a voice, a rhythm, a movement. Rooted in Black culture, created for every shade, every shape, every soul bold enough to be seen.
about.paragraph2: When you wear BLACK, you carry both history and the future, the confidence, the creativity, and the unshakable pride of a culture that shaped the world.
about.paragraph3: This isn't exclusion; it's inclusion with intention. If you believe in our rise, you belong here.
about.paragraph4: BLACK is unity. BLACK is movement. BLACK is purpose.
about.paragraph5: Don't just wear it. Live it. And even if you're not Black, when you stand with us, you're part of us. Wear it!
